description:
China is reportedly preparing a fresh antitrust investigation into Apple’s App Store practices in response to the United States’ latest trade tariffs on Chinese goods.   The controversial tariffs, imposed by President Trump, have been criticised for penalising American businesses and consumers rather than their intended foreign targets. Economists have warned these measures result in increased... Read more »

The post China prepares fresh App Store probe amid US tariffs fallout appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: China prepares fresh App Store probe amid US tariffs fallout
